title: Frankolala
author: Frankolala
content: I want to thank this forum, for I have been looking for how to learn cryptosystem especially bitcoin and aspect of it before I joined this forum. I have seen that this forum has all the information I need to know about bitcoin.   This forum have contributed so much in my life ever since I registered, in educating,teaching, advice and updating me about many aspects of life today especially on bitcoin.    I am glad I just upgraded to Jnr member rank today,my appreciation goes to everybody in the forum as your participation and contributions are very important to newbies. Learning has just started for me as a jnr member beacause this forum encourages me to make research and eager to know more on bitcoin, latest informations in the world on economy,sports, politics and society etc   The way different topics are discussed in different site on this forum, it gives knowledge and answers to all topics discussed,one can learn a lot.   I wish the world can see how things are done in this forum to learn and key in using this method to get answers in solving problems in our country or the politicians and leaders can use this method in piloting the country affairs properly, the world might become a better place than the way it is now.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: The forum does have a lot of forum users who contributed a lot to this forum like sharing informations that are not yet shared in this forum, helping those who have a problem with their mining rigs for example and many more. Anyway, congratulations on ranking up to jr. member and hopr you will learn what you wanted to learn more if that's what you want. You probably can earn Bitcoin here in this forum or other platforms that are shared in this forum like a casino hired you or having a service that they need to pay before they can use your service or whatever skills you have that can help with earn bitcoin or other crypto.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.created_time: July 27, 2022, 08:49:06 PMLast edit: July 28, 2022, 01:07:17 PM by Agbe
comments.body: You are welcome to the forum. But please lock this thread then move it to this https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5391471.0 This is a thread created by BitcoinGirl.Club for any benefit or appreciation or celebration you have in the Forum. And I also believe the thread was created to avoid spamming on beginners & help and also in reputation boards. That not withstanding, even though the mistake had been done, you can still move it to the above link provided and locked the thread. If you don't know how to do it. Just copy everything here, and open the provided Link and click reply and post what you have copied from here and again, Lock this thread.I also congratulate you for your new achievement. Learning is a continuous process from newbies to legendary members. So continue learning and educate.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Congrats, becoming a junior member is one thing. The next and incoming ranks are achievable as long ad you keep doing contributions and even humorous posy and replied on different topic here.  Piece of advise, dont get discourage if some are gonna criticise you or teach you that you think is right here. Just blend and adapt. Dont be intimidated by some higher rank who thinks they knew everything, cause the truth is everyone here are all newbies as well. Keep it up!

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Congratulations, but as far as I can see there has been a gap in your activity since you registered. If you continue to contribute to the forum regularly in a constructive manner, you will move up more ranks. But don't cheat, because there are too many people in your situation who get desperate and choose to take the fast and dishonest way out, so they end up getting caught and it's worse.

comments.author: autumnleaf
comments.body: Congrats on your rank up! For me, the first priority when i join this forum is to learn and get some knowledge and exchange ideas with other member of this forum and apply it in life, when someone really appreciate your work that is when they give you points. I think this should be our mindset. Does a rank really matter? hmmm at some point it is, where it gives you amount of benefits this forum has to offer, but we should also don't forget why Satoshi made this forum:Quote from: Phoebe BandoyBitcointalk is a public forum where blockchain enthusiasts, developers, and crypto investors discuss topics about Bitcoin, cryptocurrencies, and blockchain in general.Source : https://www.meetbunch.com/the-bitcointalk-guide

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on July 27, 2022, 08:49:06 PMYou are welcome to the forum. But please lock this thread the move it to this /index.php? You made a mistake with the link.  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5391471.0OP, @Agbe is right. You've gone up in rank, and if you think about it, you're not the first, right? Therefore, in order not to create heaps of similar topics, with thanks to yourself or the forum, try reading the topic that @Agbe pointed out to you.Do not take this as criticism, just understand that everyone is tired of such topics. The Merit fishing stunt no longer works as smoothly as it used to.Close the topic, and talk about your rank on this topic. [Guide] Announce your rank up, merit or any achievements that makes you feel great!

comments.author: Daniel91
comments.body: Frankolala, welcome to the forum!I congratulate you on your promotion to the forum, but also on the right attitude and thinking.Yes, this forum is really a very good place to learn basic things about the crypto market but also to get to know new trends and crypto projects.Considering that you started with crypto research, I believe that we can soon expect your contribution on this forum, with the presentation of news from the crypto world

comments.author: Shamm
comments.body: Hello OP good day and congratulations for achieving the Jr.Member rank here in our community. Yes you are right mate we are glad that we are here because we can learn a lot of things about bitcoin or any crypto currencies. Many high ranks teaches us or guide us by their thread and all we need to do is to study and. Research to gain that knowledge they gave us.Once again congrats and good luck to your journey .

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: As you are now already Junior member on the forum you have crossed the first step of ranking up on forum so congratulations on the same but would advice you to spend some more time learning about bitcoin and contributing more effectively to the discussions and it will benefit you in the long run.Follow the forum rules and don't get in rush as there is still lot to learn and grow on the forum so hope you understand this and manage your forum journey well.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on July 27, 2022, 08:49:06 PMYou are welcome to the forum. But please lock this thread then move it to this https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5391471.0 This is a thread created by BitcoinGirl.Club for any benefit or appreciation or celebration you have in the Forum. And I also believe the thread was created to avoid spamming on beginners & help and also in reputation boards. That not withstanding, even though the mistake had been done, you can still move it to the above link provided and locked the thread. If you don't know how to do it. Just copy everything here, and open the provided Link and click reply and post what you have copied from here and again, Lock this thread.I also congratulate you for your new achievement. Learning is a continuous process from newbies to legendary members. So continue learning and educate.Thank you very much for the correction you have done for me. I have just learnt something new again, life is all about learning something new.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: First, I wanna say a big congratulations to you on your new rank, jr. member rank is the beginning of the journey, many of us started from and went past the rank you are celebrating, the feeling is indeed good, and i pray you don't give up before the journey becomes even more interesting.Bitcointalk is indeed one hell of a forum filled with all kinds of crypto related information, there is nothing that has to do with crypto that you wont find on this forum, since you already know all this, all i can tell you right now is to keep reading, asking questions, learning and i believe that in no distant time, you will be celebrating achieving one of the higher ranks, and when that time comes, please make sure to announce your new rank on this thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5391471.0(i believe i am not the first user pointing you to this thread)
